title: Guardian mummy
data:
***Version [0.31](/0.31 "0.31")**: This article **may not be** up to date for the [latest stable release](/0.32 "0.32") of Crawl.*

*For a list of all mummies, see [list of mummies](/List_of_mummies "List of mummies").*

| guardian mummy M [![Guardian mummy.png](/images/e/ef/Guardian_mummy.png)](/File:Guardian_mummy.png) |                                                                                                                                                                                             |
| --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| [HP](/Hit_points "Hit points")                                                                      | 30-61                                                                                                                                                                                       |

| [Will](/Willpower "Willpower")                                                                      | 40                                                                                                                                                                                          |
| Attack1                                                                                             | 30 ([hit](/Attack_type "Attack type"): [plain](/Attack_flavour "Attack flavour"))                                                                                                           |
| [Resistances](/Resistance "Resistance")                                                             | [rC+](/Cold "Cold") [rPois+++](/Poison "Poison") [rDrown](/Asphyxiation "Asphyxiation") [rMiasma](/Miasma "Miasma") [rN+++](/Negative_energy "Negative energy") [rTorm](/Torment "Torment") |

|   |                                                                          |
| - | ------------------------------------------------------------------------ |
|   | An ancient warrior, embalmed and cursed to walk in undeath for eternity. |

## Useful Info

**Guardian mummies** behave much like regular [mummies](/Mummy_\(monster\) "Mummy (monster)"), shuffling into melee, with stronger melee attacks. Unlike plain mummies, killing a guardian mummy causes a debilitating [death curse](/Death_curse "Death curse"). They are found in or guarding [the Tomb](/The_Tomb "The Tomb"), as well as in certain undead [vaults](/Vault "Vault").

## Tips & Tricks

- If possible, try to lure them to relatively isolated, already cleared areas first; [noise](/Noise "Noise") travels far in [the Tomb](/The_Tomb "The Tomb"), and you don't want to find yourself [slowed](/Slow "Slow") or [tormented](/Torment "Torment") while facing down a dozen angry mummies.
- Being [undead](/Undead "Undead") (through species or [Death Form](/Death_Form "Death Form")) will take much of the sting out of their death curse. However, undead creatures can still be slowed.

## History

- Prior to [0.28](/0.28 "0.28"), guardian mummies could [see invisible](/See_invisible "See invisible").

Guardian mummy

From CrawlWiki
Jump to: navigation, search
Version 0.31: This article may not be up to date for the latest stable release of Crawl.

For a list of all mummies, see list of mummies.

guardian mummy M 
HP 30-61
HD 7
XP 330
Speed 8
AC 6
EV 9
Will 40
Attack1 30 (hit: plain)


Resistances rC+
rPois+++
rDrown
rMiasma
rN+++
rTorm
Vulnerabilities Holy
Habitat Land
Intelligence Human
Uses Weapons & armour
Starting equipment
Open doors
Holiness Undead
Size Large
Type mummy, mummy
Flags Fighter
An ancient warrior, embalmed and cursed to walk in undeath for eternity.

Useful Info

Guardian mummies behave much like regular mummies, shuffling into melee, with stronger melee attacks. Unlike plain mummies, killing a guardian mummy causes a debilitating death curse. They are found in or guarding the Tomb, as well as in certain undead vaults.

Tips & Tricks

  • If possible, try to lure them to relatively isolated, already cleared areas first; noise travels far in the Tomb, and you don't want to find yourself slowed or tormented while facing down a dozen angry mummies.
  • Being undead (through species or Death Form) will take much of the sting out of their death curse. However, undead creatures can still be slowed.

History

  • Prior to 0.28, guardian mummies could see invisible.

{{version031}}
{{list of|mummies}}
{{monster info}}

==Useful Info==
'''Guardian mummies''' behave much like regular [[mummy (monster)|mummies]], shuffling into melee, with stronger melee attacks. Unlike plain mummies, killing a guardian mummy causes a debilitating [[death curse]]. They are found in or guarding [[the Tomb]], as well as in certain undead [[vault]]s.
 
==Tips & Tricks==
*If possible, try to lure them to relatively isolated, already cleared areas first; [[noise]] travels far in [[the Tomb]], and you don't want to find yourself [[slow]]ed or [[torment]]ed while facing down a dozen angry mummies.
*Being [[undead]] (through species or [[Death Form]]) will take much of the sting out of their death curse. However, undead creatures can still be slowed.

==History==
*Prior to [[0.28]], guardian mummies could [[see invisible]].
